original_title: Classic Cartoon Favorites, Vol. 1 - Starring Mickey
overview: All of the shorts feature Mickey Mouse: Mickey's Circus (1936), Mickey's Garden (1935), The Little Whirlwind (1941), On Ice (1935), Hawaiian Holiday (1937), Moving Day (1936), Orphan's Picnic (1936)
title: Classic Cartoon Favorites, Vol. 1 - Starring Mickey
